section.name: name
section.description: hleg - an HCLI for interacting with State Legislature bill aggregation.

section.name: description
section.description: HCLI hleg is a pypi wrapper that contains an HCLI sample application (hleg); hleg is a legislature bill aggregation service that helps facilitate rapid action by providing a useful list of bills on a timeline alongside links to facilitate testifying (e.g. online testimony).

command.name: ls
command.description: The "ls" command lists all queued bills ordered by time.

section.name: name
section.description: ls - lists all queued bills ordered by time.

section.name: description
section.description: The service periodically refreshes state legislature information and allows for the aggregation to list its refreshed information.
